Initializer# init(asset:content:)

RealityKitSwiftUIvisionOS 26.0+

```
nonisolated
init<Model>(
    asset: Model3DAsset,
    @ViewBuilder content: @escaping (ResolvedModel3D) -> Model
) where Content == Model3DPlaceholderContent<Model, EmptyView>, Model : View
```

Available when `Content` conforms to `View`.
